EstablishmentDetail.RightToReply:
<p>
	The business is working with Halton Council Environmental health to improve the premises rating score and will in due course request a re-inspection. The following matters have been addressed or are in hand - the diary will be comleted daily, hte food safety managemtn system will be available at all times, staff training is being undertaken and structural works have been attended to. </p>
